attributes.action: ensure we hold a national referendum over the new European treaty before signing!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of the UK should have the right, as promised, to have their say on loosing our rights to Europe in the new treaty. The PM should hold a referendum upon this immediatly before signing our rights away.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
